name: typescript-extraction-demo
description: Demo project showing TypeScript code extraction with Lilypad SDK

scripts.test: npm run extract && npm run test:metadata && npm run dev
scripts.test:metadata: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const m=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./lilypad-metadata.json')); console.log('âœ… Found', Object.keys(m.functions).length, 'versioned functions');"
